Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,745Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 125

Summary: The book's cover features a lavish illustration of an alien with a roughly 'centaur' configuration of limbs. It's got a set of massive spikes for front legs that look great for digging and cleaving people in two, and a pair of cat like, pawed digidigrades for back legs. The spine and joints are armor plated, while the soft belly is lined with octopus arms of wildly varying sizes. The alien is also proudly presenting his three MASSIVE PHALLUSES for the audience. Tim sputters and laughs, opening the book up and flipping through it lazily. The quality is ridiculously good overall. It's hand bound, full color, lavishly illustrated with diagrams and charts and cultural notes and- it's honestly hilariously Jason in nature now that he thinks about it. Like, of course, Jason with his snobby love of all things hand crafted would masturbate to niche fetish shit in a weird format full of way too much worldbuilding. entry.title: You Look So Much Like Him(Your not him But you're all of what we've last left of him)
entry.summary:
Author: NOUFFE

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,939Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 238

Summary: ‘ If you're reading this it means I'm dead ‘ No greeting. No hello. Alfred froze, his heart stopped a moment before his eyes wide in panic and disbelief. Trying to see if it was probably some kind of joke that maybe it was forged but deep inside he knew all too well it isn't. ’ Listen, when I went on this search for Bruce in the time stream, I experienced hell. Something no one should ever survive. My body couldn't keep up, especially with something in me. ‘ Now that was enough to make Alfred's mind whirl in different scenarios. When he last saw the boy he was pale and thin when he returned Bruce back from the time stream and walked off the Manor never to be heard or seen again for months. He didn't want to overthink. Could it be? ’ You guessed it, that's a baby in the basket. Congrats. ‘   Or To where I switch up the TimKon Baby Fic, to a more Tim died giving birth and now the BatFam raises their last memory of their own, while dealing with the grief of loosing a family. Kon comes back alive to know the love of his life is dead and he has a son to raise without Tim.

entry.title: “Heron, Whose Ghost Are You?”
entry.summary:
Author: Aaronymous9

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,532Chapters: 14/70Kudos: 349

Summary: Tim Drake accidentally creates a baby with his and Kon’s DNA while trying to bring him back from the dead. He decides his best course of action is to fake his death and start a new life as a single father. Or, Typical Timkon Clone Baby AU that tackles themes of queerness, self-discovery, the ethics of fighting crime, and what it means to be a good father.
